page.title: 07EDDERTON PARISH CHURCH
page.content: {Edderton Church}is 101 years old.The minister is in charge of 3 churches as none of the congregations are large enough.He wears a long black cloak and a white dog collar.A service lasts one hour.At a well attended service there are about 25 in the congregation but this can be as low as 8.There are 24 communicant members and 16 non members.There are 4 elders.There is a Sunday-school with a roll of 15 children.A typical service starts with a psalm,then a reading,a prayer,a hymn ,a reading,another hymn,a sermon ,a prayer,a hymn and a blessing.People attend the service from a radius of about 5 kilometres. Usually an Edderton girl who is getting married will be married in the Parish Church and if a baby is born in Edderton it is baptized in the Church.
